name: ParallelMidpointLocator
description: A ParallelMidpointLocator that is used to place label at the midpoint of a routed connection. The midpoint is always in the center of an edge. The label is aligned to the connection angle at the calculated conection segment.

functions.name: init
functions.description:
Constructs a ParallelMidpointLocator with optional padding to the connection.

if the parameter distanceFromConnection is less than zero the label is placed above of the connection. Else the label is below the connection.

parameters.name: distanceFromConnection
parameters.description: the distance of the label to the connection.

functions.name: relocate
functions.description: Relocates the given Figure always in the center of an edge.
